name: .BFSAR File Extension
summary: Learn about .BFSAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: BFSAR files are not meant to be manually opened. They are referenced by the game on the Wii U or Switch game console. However, gamers that want to modify the sound effects stored in BFSAR archives often use the MK8 BFSAR Editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
